item.title: Missing fire hydrant plate, 24th August
item.description:
The information plate adjacent to the fire hydrant near 12 Clare Way has gone missing. - This means that the information is not available to fire crews.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clare Way, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Toilets, 24th August
item.description:
Disgusting I’d rather use a bush to go toilet than let myself or my children use these facilities if you can call them that. Everything is rotten Flys everywhere Wee and foul on the ground No toilet roll taps had something stuck on them, I’ve spoken to a handful of people who said they have also reported but nothing happens.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stone Park Avenue, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Newman Street nameplate, 24th August
item.description:
Newman Street nameplate here (circled in photo) is much too small and much too high, especially for vision impaired pedestrians. Suggest either a long rectangular (larger font) sign is installed at the same location, or a normal-sized one (this one is miniature!) be installed at normal height on building please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 93, Newman Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights facing wrong way, 24th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Surrey Quays Road, Rotherhithe, London
